word: IN HARMONY WITH THIS INJUNCTION, BELIEVERS IN CHRIST ARE URGED TO GIVE CANDID CONSIDERATION TO THE EVIDENCES OF DIVINE GUIDANCE IN THE ADVENT MOVEMENT OF THE PRESENT DAY, AND THE MANIFESTATION OF THE GIFT OF PROPHECY CONNECTED WITH THIS MOVEMENT. TO DISREGARD THE WORK OF THE HOLY SPIRIT, AS MANIFESTED THROUGH THIS GIFT, IS PERILOUS. YET WE ARE ADMONISHED TO "BEWARE OF FALSE PROPHETS, WHICH COME TO YOU IN SHEEP'S CLOTHING, BUT INWARDLY THEY ARE RAVENING WOLVES." AND THE TEST IS GIVEN, "YE SHALL KNOW THEM BY THEIR FRUITS."
